text: Maria Christina "Mimi" Kok (25 January 1934 - 19 April 2014) was a Dutch actress. She was best known for her work with entertainer Wim T. Schippers. She appeared in the movies Paranoia (1967), Red Sien (1975) and Han de Wit (1990). She was born in Amsterdam, North Holland. Kok died from a lung disease on 19 April 2014 in Amsterdam. She was 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:Disease-related deaths in the Netherlands Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:Actors from Amsterdam
title: Mimi Kok
